name: mr. Blend
details:
BlenderName: Mr. Blend 
Type: Guitar/Bass/Synth 
Short description: Blender (parallel loop) - special device for mixing dry and wet (FX loop) signals. Great tool for adding new colors to you sound without loosing original tone.
Controls: 
Knob Mix - dry and wet signal proportions.
Knob Level - output volume.
Swicth Phase - inverts loop signal phase.
Features:
Mr. Blend is a parallel Fx-loop in a stompbox. Mostly favored by bass players, because it retains clean bass sound and make possible to add any effect of any stompbox.
Phase switch corrects loop phase, you can add or substract wet and dry signals.
Mr. Blend can be used as active Y-splitter, to play one guitar for two amplifiers.
Also Mr. Blend can be used as simple 2 channel mixer.
Dimensions: Box dimensions without knobs are 111х60х30 mm (4.3x2.4x1.2”) 
Power supply: 9V regulated center negative power adapter or 9v battery. Current draw: 12 mA max.
